page.title: 13TRAFFIC
page.content: The traffic that flows through Forest Town is mostly lorries and vans. Most of the lorries are from the coal industry and are going to Nottingham or Mansfield. Buses use this route regularly to go to Clipstone and Mansfield Woodhouse. Other lorries that use this route are furniture, timber and gravel lorries, milk floats and rubbish skips. The road from Clipstone and Old Mill Lane are used most for coming in and out of town. These roads are very important because they are the outer ring roads of Mansfield. There are quite a few county council vans as well, probably for all the new housing estates. Most of the lorries are food lorries going into town with things like bread and chocolate. {KATRINA GRANT
